title: FPS suddenly drop.
body: I just bought a new laptop. It has GTX 960 and I7 6th generation cpu and 16gb ram. When I am playing lol, fps is usually 120. But after the new patch update, fps constantly drops to 30 from time to time. I  have no idea why.

replies.body:
Congrats on the new laptop! If you haven't already, be sure to check for any missed driver updates as that could impact your fps while playing games. On top of that, be sure to check out the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some other common fps issues.

Hit us up if you've got any questions along the way!
